attributes.action: Make it a law for supermarkets to stop using single use plastics in their stores
attributes.background: Single use plastics are killing marine life. Not only them, but bioaccumulation will mean that microplastics will be in the food we eat too. We need nature to survive, so let’s eliminate what’s threatening it, so WE can survive, as well as all the animals who don’t deserve suffocating in our plastic
